name: beta-amyrin,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (hydroxylating)
definition: beta-Amyrin + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> 11alpha-Hydroxy-beta-amyrin + H2O + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]
comment: the first step of two-step reaction (see R09817, R09815+R09816)
